jobDescription: We are looking for Data Architect/Data Modeler who possess the following skills for our direct client in LA, CA:  o 6+ years of Dimensional and Relational Data Modeling  experience using Star Schemas/Snowflakes, Fact, and Dimension  tables  o 6+ years of experience designing and developing logical and  physical database designs  o 6+ years of experience implementing data marts  o 6+ years of experience designing and developing  OLAP/ROLAP/MOLAP data models. - provided by Dice  Data Architect, Data Modeler, Dimensional, Relational Data Modeling, Star Schemas, Snowflakes, logical, physical, data marts, OLAP, ROLAP, MOLAP, data models
